title: Investing in What Works for America's Communities
summary: The Low Income Investment Fund, with funding from the Citi Foundation, partnered with the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco to publish "", a collection of essays from key leaders in the U.S. community and economic development field that provides dozens of innovative ideas that can bring new opportunities to America's struggling communities. Visit the link to download a free digital copy of the book and learn more about this initiative.
tag-1: Investing in What Works for America's Communities
